Class Instance

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.Instance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Copyable

    public class Instance
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Copyable
    The abstract class representing some instance.

    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
